item.title: 绿色投资者从特朗普当选总统中找到一线希望
item.description:
自2021年以来，清洁能源公司的股价每年都在下跌，但有人说该行业已经触底。【原文：

Shares in clean energy companies have fallen every year since 2021, but some say the sector has hit bottom.

】

item.title: 欧洲工业强国必须降低能源成本
item.description:
如果德国下届政府不能控制住飞涨的账单，企业就会直接迁往国外。【原文：

If Germany’s next government doesn’t get a grip on rocketing bills, companies will simply move abroad.

】

item.title: 南非报告 2024 年矿难死亡人数为 42 人，创历史最低纪录
item.description: 南非是世界上铂金储量最大的国家，其矿山去年的死亡人数是有记录以来最低的。【原文：Mines in South Africa, which has the world’s biggest reserves of platinum, last year registered the lowest number of deaths on record.】

item.title: 尼日利亚中央银行行长称奈拉改革吸引投资者
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行行长奥拉耶米-卡多佐（Olayemi Cardoso）表示，汇率改革使奈拉更具竞争力，很可能会吸引投资者。【原文：Nigerian Central Bank Governor Olayemi Cardoso said exchange-rate reforms that have made the naira more competitive are likely to lure investors.】

item.title: 德国就业日益受到经济转型的威胁
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，德国的劳动力市场正日益受到该国努力实现经济现代化的拖累。【原文：Germany’s labor market is increasingly weighed down by the country’s struggle to modernize its economy, according to a new study.】

item.title: 墨西哥利率决议前通胀放缓超预期
item.description: 1 月初，墨西哥年度通胀率的放缓幅度略高于预期，使央行在下一次政策会议上进行更大幅度降息的可能性继续存在。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation slowed slightly more than expected in early January, keeping in play chances of a bigger interest rate cut at the central bank’s next policy meeting.】

item.title: 英国法院裁定天空博彩公司非法收集赌客数据
item.description: 伦敦一名法官裁定，Fanduel 的所有者 Flutter Entertainment Plc 旗下的一家公司非法收集了一名嗜赌顾客的数据，以对其进行在线营销。【原文：A unit of Fanduel-owner Flutter Entertainment Plc illegally collected the data of a gambling-addicted customer to profile him for marketing purposes online, a London judge ruled.】

item.title: 日本最大投资者押注美国引领的人工智能黄金时代
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Min Jeong Lee 将关注支持千亿美元项目 "星际之门 "的人工智能爱好者联盟的外国成员。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Min Jeong Lee looks at the foreign member of the coalition of AI enthusiasts backing the $100 billion Project Stargate.】

item.title: 关税威胁四起，WTO负责人请大家 "冷静
item.description: 在瑞士达沃斯，世界贸易组织（WTO）主席对前来聆听她演讲的听众提出了一个建议，这个词在董事会会议室、政府首都和交易大厅引发了整整一周的焦虑：关税。【原文：The head of the World Trade Organization had a suggestion for the audience in Davos, Switzerland, gathered to hear her speak about a word that’s been raising anxiety in boardrooms, government capitals and trading floors all week: tariffs.】

item.title: 法国加密初创公司联合创始人遭绑架后获释
item.description: 巴黎检察官办公室在一份声明中说，在法国中部被绑架的法国加密钱包初创公司 Ledger SAS 的一名联合创始人已经获释。【原文：A co-founder of French crypto wallet startup Ledger SAS who was kidnapped in central France has been released, the Paris prosecutor’s office said in a statement.】

item.title: 阿布扎比基金为特朗普的千亿美元人工智能计划提供资金支持
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就任美国总统的第二天，就公布了一项1000亿美元的人工智能基础设施投资计划，该计划得到了科技界三大巨头--OpenAI、软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp）和甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp）的支持。然后是一家很少有人听说过的阿布扎比公司：MGX。【原文：A day after his inauguration as US President, Donald Trump unveiled a $100 billion venture to fund artificial intelligence infrastructure, backed by three of the biggest names in tech - OpenAI, SoftBank Group Corp. and Oracle Corp. Then there was an Abu Dhabi-based firm that few had heard of: MGX.】

item.title: 据说 GP 和 TSR 将提高对萨尔茨吉特钢铁公司的收购价
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由工业企业集团 GP Günter Papenburg AG 支持的一个财团提高了对 Salzgitter AG 的出价，该交易对这家德国钢铁制造商的估值约为 11 亿欧元（12 亿美元）。【原文：A consortium backed by industrial conglomerate GP Günter Papenburg AG has boosted its bid for Salzgitter AG in a deal that could value the German steelmaker at about €1.1 billion ($1.2 billion), people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 大股票买家错过了 S&P 500 指数的最新涨势
item.description: 让 S&P 500 指数升至创纪录边缘的涨势缺少了一个要素：大资金投资者的流入。【原文：The gains that lifted the S&P 500 to the cusp of a fresh record have been missing one ingredient: inflows from big-money investors.】

item.title: 英国推迟使用超市扫描仪进行通货膨胀统计
item.description: 英国统计机构将使用超市扫描仪信息计算通货膨胀率的工作推迟到明年，这是该机构数据收集现代化工作的最新延误。【原文：The UK statistics agency pushed back the use of supermarket scanner information to calculate inflation until next year, the latest delay to its efforts to modernize its data gathering.】

item.title: 土耳其央行大幅降息并调整指导原则
item.description: 土耳其中央银行周四连续第二次大幅降息，并改变了其政策指导的主要支柱之一。【原文：Turkey’s central bank delivered a second consecutive sizable interest-rate cut on Thursday and changed one of the main pillars of its policy guidance.】

item.title: 甲骨文借助特朗普支持的人工智能协议向云计算三巨头发起冲击
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）在经历了四分之一个世纪以来最好的一年之后，于 2025 年冲出重围。与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）共同公布的一项计划，让人们更加希望甲骨文公司的云计算业务将从人工智能中受益。【原文：Oracle Corp. has charged out of the gate in 2025, after its best year in a quarter-century. A plan unveiled with President Donald Trump has intensified hopes that its cloud business will see a tailwind from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 苹果和谷歌的移动主导地位引发英国数字市场调查
item.description: 苹果公司和 Alphabet 公司遭到英国反垄断调查，原因是担心它们在移动服务领域的主导地位扭曲了市场，并为竞争对手设置了进入壁垒。【原文：Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc. were hit with UK antitrust investigations over concerns their dominance in mobile services is distorting the market and putting up barriers to entry for competitors.】

item.title: 埃斯克里瓦认为欧洲央行需要在下学期转向中性立场
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）认为，欧洲中央银行应将货币政策调整到既不刺激经济也不限制经济的水平。【原文：The European Central Bank should adjust monetary policy to a level that neither stimulates nor constricts the economy, according to Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva.】

item.title: 意大利计划提前提升天然气储备以应对价格上涨担忧
item.description: 由于市场担心天然气价格将在更长时间内保持高位，意大利正在采取行动，在正式储备季节到来之前增加天然气储备。【原文：Italy is moving to boost its gas reserves ahead of the official stockpiling season, as concerns that prices are set to remain elevated for longer dominate the market.】

item.title: 欧盟将在人工智能、先进研究和清洁技术上下注，以求在竞争中立于不败之地
item.description: 欧盟将提议仿照美国政府实体建立一个先进研究项目机构，对战略技术进行投资，以此作为提高欧盟竞争力的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：The European Union will propose establishing an advanced research project agency modeled on US government entities to invest in strategic technologies as part of a broader drive to boost the bloc’s competitiveness.】

item.title: 股市多头凝神静气，寻找反弹线索
item.description: S&P 500 指数近期的走高缺少了一个重要因素：大资金经理的流入。对于那些押注进一步反弹的投资者来说，这是一个可喜的进展。【原文：The S&P 500’s recent leg higher has been missing an important ingredient: inflows from big-money managers. For those betting on a further rally, that’s a welcome development.】

item.title: Prosus 首席执行官布洛伊西拥有 200 亿美元，准备在欧洲大展拳脚
item.description: Prosus NV 首席执行官 Fabricio Bloisi 表示，这家技术投资者拥有近 200 亿美元的资金，并准备在欧洲发展。【原文：Prosus NV Chief Executive Officer Fabricio Bloisi said the technology investor has close to $20 billion to spend and is ready to grow in Europe.】

item.title: 英国央行资本顾问称，如果规则改变，应放弃 AT1s
item.description: 英国央行一位专门负责监管资本的顾问在一次行业活动上表示，如果英国央行决定全面修订其规则，附加一级债券不应成为银行资本堆栈的一部分。【原文：Additional Tier 1 bonds should not be part of banks’ capital stack if and when the Bank of England decides to overhaul its rules, an adviser at the central bank specializing in regulatory capital said at an industry event.】

item.title: 彪马与阿迪达斯股价表现差距进一步拉大
item.description: 自从比约恩-古尔登（Bjorn Gulden）跳槽到阿迪达斯股份公司（Adidas AG）和彪马股份公司（Puma SE）之后，这两家德国体育用品制造商之间的股价表现差距变得更大了。【原文：The gulf in performance between Adidas AG and Puma SE shares since Bjorn Gulden hopped between the German sportswear makers just got even wider.】

item.title: Stellantis 供应商 CLN 要求银行减记 90% 债务
item.description: 意大利汽车零部件制造商 CLN-Coils Lamiere Nastri SpA 要求银行债权人减记约 90% 的无担保贷款，以求在汽车行业危机中大幅削减债务。【原文：Italian car-parts manufacturer CLN-Coils Lamiere Nastri SpA asked bank creditors to write down about 90% of their unsecured loans as it seeks to drastically reduce its debt amid the crisis in the automotive sector.】

item.title: 阿联酋部长对今年贸易额持续增长持乐观态度
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对进口商品征收高额关税，但阿拉伯联合酋长国认为今年的全球贸易仍将增长。【原文：The United Arab Emirates sees global trade growing this year, despite US President Donald Trump threatening to impose major tariffs on imports.】

item.title: PJT 与新世界债券持有人就贷款谈判举行电话会议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，债务顾问公司PJT Partners Inc.周四与新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Ltd.）的一些美元债券持有人举行了一次电话会议，讨论这家陷入困境的开发商正在进行的贷款谈判最终是否会导致其债券违约的风险。【原文：Debt adviser PJT Partners Inc. held a call with some New World Development Ltd. dollar-bond holders Thursday to discuss whether the distressed developer’s ongoing loan talks could eventually risk a default on its bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 津巴布韦啤酒制造商的争议税款增至 7,300 万美元
item.description: 由于可口可乐公司在当地的装瓶商继续通过法律途径要求以当地货币支付税款，津巴布韦啤酒制造商德尔塔公司（Delta Corp.【原文：Zimbabwean beer maker Delta Corp.’s disputed tax bill has risen to $73 million as the local bottler of Coca-Cola Co. continues its legal bid to pay these levies in local currency.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦寻求引渡与伊姆兰-汗有关联的地产大亨
item.description: 巴基斯坦正在寻求从阿拉伯联合酋长国引渡房地产大亨马利克-里亚兹-侯赛因（Malik Riaz Hussain），此前法院宣布他在一起贪污案中潜逃，前总理伊姆兰-汗（Imran Khan）因滥用职权于上周被定罪。【原文：Pakistan is seeking extradition of a real estate tycoon Malik Riaz Hussain from the United Arab Emirates, after a court declared him an absconder in a graft case in which former prime minister Imran Khan was convicted last week for misusing his power.】

item.title: 挪威在本月利率未变的情况下三月降息
item.description: 挪威央行在本月将借贷成本维持在16年来的最高水平不变后，让投资者对其3月份的首次宽松举措做好了准备。【原文：Norway’s central bank primed investors for its first easing move in March after keeping borrowing costs unchanged this month at a 16-year high.】
